Class Pusher

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Pusher

  • public class Pusher
extends java.lang.Object
    A class needed to perform pushnotification all users in the userlist
    Author:
    Stefan Fuchs, Jan-Niklas Wortmann
    See Also:
    JSONObject, JSONArray, Session, IOException, ArrayList, List, Collectors
